extendedInfo.description: ** IF YOU ENJOY THIS APP PLEASE CHECK OUT MY NEWLY RELEASED CONVERT EVERYTHING APP  **** An ad free donate version is also available **A simple and straightforward flash card maker / creator, designed with ease of use, simplicity, and clean design in mind.Features:- Backup/restore database of cards for easy transfer between devices- Allows for images via Camera, Gallery, or create your own using the built in sketch feature.- Mark cards as known after memorizing them- Sort cards alphabetically, by creation, modification, pending, complete- Timer- Record / attach audio filesUsage:  To begin, first create a new deck of cards by hitting the pencil icon in the upper right of the title bar. Next, be sure to give the deck a meaningful name for easy reference. You can edit and delete decks via long pressing on them. Once the deck is created you can begin making cards.  To make a card, select the desired deck from the main screen. This will bring you to a new screen. Similar to deck creation, select the pencil icon in the top right. This will bring you to a new screen where you can input the question, answer, and if you like a picture. Hit the check mark in the upper right to save the card.  To view a card or cards select the deck and then the card where you would like to begin. You can use the left and right arrow icons in the title bar to navigate between cards. To view the answer of a question, press anywhere on the card to display the answer. If you like, you can use the "x" and check mark icons beneath a card to mark a card as completed or not. This is totally optional but helps you keep track of what you need to know and what you already know. You can edit,delete,mark status of cards by long pressing them from listing screen.  To sort through cards or decks you can select the gear icon in the upper left of the title bar. To backup/restore, reset cards decks, you can find these options in the menu.

reviews.title: Best flashcard app on market
reviews.comment: Its great ! Helped me get an A on my test. There should be mode where you have the answer on the front and the question on the back too? You\'re supposed to switch up and use flashcards like that. Plz include
reviews.author: Tahj Hinton

reviews.comment: OK. Crashes a lot. If you try to learn a vocab its frustrating because you can only flip once. Every time you go back to the list it starts at the very top instead of where you left off. Has a completed list that you have to reset in order to refresh. Why? It is very annoying when you just added 600 vocab words.
reviews.author: MARAN ATHA

reviews.title: Really helpful
reviews.comment: Been using it a lot...just a problem, it crashes too often, usually when the number of pending cards is the number of completed cards+2. Also, it would be great to be able to switch the question-answer
reviews.author: Norbert Vaszil

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: This is the best! Is it possible the answer becomes the question when testing?
reviews.author: Stone Mao

reviews.title: Incredible
reviews.comment: I rarely rate apps, but this one is the sh*t. So easy to use, the ad at the bottom is barely noticeable, you can use the voice option to type all your questions and answers, let\'s you make picture flashcards, audio, sketching, its just the best
reviews.author: Josh Gill

reviews.title: THANK YOU!
reviews.comment: This helped me out so much with all of my tests!! So happy :D
reviews.author: Simran M

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: Thanks for creating a great app, I love this. Please create a widget for the home screen.
reviews.author: Emil Arthur

reviews.title: Useful
reviews.comment: A good app, however an option to shuffle card would be good
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Absolutely amazing
reviews.comment: Would be better if you could change the card colors to neon colors or something  or randomly generate different colored cards as you study
reviews.author: Drake Britton

reviews.title: Confusing and poorly laid out.
reviews.comment: The user interface is pretty confusing but the lack of active spell correct is a deal breaker. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: Sean Williams

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: Just what I was looking for, easy and simple! 5* if you could create folders so that you could have multiple decks inside different folders.
reviews.author: Hannah H

reviews.title: addicting
reviews.comment: my sister got addicted to this app and she showed it to me so now im addicted to it. its very useful for spanish vocab and Cesar\'s English
reviews.author: Hannah Schultz

reviews.title: Very useful
reviews.comment: I love the app. I wish it had a randomize option tho. And that i could move cards to a different set if i need to. That would help alot. *thank you flash card wizard team!!
reviews.author: Osha Chitwood

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Clean, simple, easy to use. Very straight forward and exactly what I was looking for.
reviews.author: Emily Wagner

reviews.title: Great, but a still a bit buggy.
Nothing much to complain about...
reviews.comment: Except.... Could you maybe make a shuffle/randomize option? Kinda the point of flashcards.
reviews.author: Chris Matsumoto

reviews.title: Ehhh
reviews.comment: My 3rd entry and it crashed. Gave it a couple more tries-- keep crashing =/  Please fix it asap!
reviews.author: Sonia Santos

reviews.title: Great app but has issues
reviews.comment: Its a good app I love the fact you can place your own pic to study but you have to fix because every single time I go to add another flashcard once I press the picture to place it closes up on me I constantly need to keep doing it a second time smh.
reviews.author: Stephanie Santos
